alert.note: Alert for Madison; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 30 at 4:24PM CDT until March 30 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Yazoo County in central Mississippi... Madison County in central Mississippi... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 424 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ebenezer to 6 miles southeast of Myrleville to near Annandale, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Canton around 435 PM CDT. Way around 440 PM CDT. Sharon around 450 PM CDT. Cameron and Camden around 455 PM CDT. Farmhaven around 500 PM CDT. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
